thread.section_title: Hotel Diocleziano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and customer service
thread.title_full: Great location and customer service - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: 503eileena
title: Great location and customer service
text: Great location, they have the greatest customer service ever. Big rooms with the mini bar available with some things for free. Great great buffet breakfast . The location is just in front the Termini terminal and metro, just perfect. Walking distance and beautiful and clean hotel. The staffing are more than great, definitely I will stay again and again.
